cs236.lab2
Class TokenizerServer

java.lang.Object
  cs236.lab2.TokenizerServer

public class TokenizerServer
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a new thread to parse Tokens into a Datalog program. This class used to be a separate thread, but I decided to make it a regular class.

Constructor Summary
TokenizerServer(Tokenizer tTokenizer)
          Creates a new instance with a Tokenizer to run.
 
Method Summary
 DatalogProgram run()
          Passes Tokens received from Tokenizer to a queue in DatalogProgram to parse.
 void stopParsing()
          Stops parsing tokens from Tokenizer.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

stopParsing

public void stopParsing()
Stops parsing tokens from Tokenizer.

run

public DatalogProgram run()
Passes Tokens received from Tokenizer to a queue in DatalogProgram to parse. DatalogProgram parses in it's own Thread while this passes in new Tokens.

Returns:
the complete DatalogProgram
